ctx: intros p r Heqpqr q s Hcp Hcq Hcr Hcs Heqps.
induction p as [| a p' IHp'].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) r : list (Term A n) Heqpqr : eqP A eqA n nil r q, s : list (Term A n) Hcp : canonical A0 eqA ltM nil Hcq : canonical A0 eqA ltM q Hcr : canonical A0 eqA ltM r Hcs : canonical A0 eqA ltM s Heqps : eqP A eqA n q s Unable to unify "eqP ?M1865 ?M1868 ?M1876 (pluspf ?M1866 ?M1869 ?M1875 ?M1878 ?M1880 (pO ?M1865 ?M1876)) ?M1880" with "eqP A eqA n (pO A n) (multpf r s)".

ctx: intros p r Heqpqr q s Hcp Hcq Hcr Hcs Heqps.
induction p as [| a p' IHp'].
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet --.

ctx: intros p r Heqpqr q s Hcp Hcq Hcr Hcs Heqps.
induction p as [| a p' IHp'].
exceptions.tactic: apply eqp_pluspf_com_l with (r := multpf p' s).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : Term A n p', r : list (Term A n) Heqpqr : eqP A eqA n (a :: p') r q, s : list (Term A n) Hcp : canonical A0 eqA ltM (a :: p') Hcq : canonical A0 eqA ltM q Hcr : canonical A0 eqA ltM r Hcs : canonical A0 eqA ltM s Heqps : eqP A eqA n q s IHp' : eqP A eqA n p' r -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p' -> eqP A eqA n (multpf p' q) (multpf r s) Unable to unify "eqP A ?M4635 n (pluspf ?M4633 ?M4636 ?M4642 ?M4645 ?M4647 (multpf p' s)) (pluspf ?M4633 ?M4636 ?M4642 ?M4645 ?M4648 (multpf p' s))" with "eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) (multpf p' q)) (multpf r s)".

original: intros p r Heqpqr q s Hcp Hcq Hcr Hcs Heqps. induction p as [| a p' IHp']. -- simpl. apply p0_pluspf_r. auto. -- simpl. apply eqp_pluspf_com_l with (r := multpf p' s). ++ apply multpf_disr_pX; auto. ++ apply eqp_pluspf_com; auto.
